title: AlarmStorageConvertToTimestamp (Function)
text:
FUNCTION AlarmStorageConvertToTimestamp :
Timestamp
This function provides the inverse functionality of function AlarmStorageConvertFromTimestamp.
Converts SYSTIMEDATE (UTC value) into a timestamp.

rows.Name: AlarmStorageConvertToTimestamp
rows.Comment: The timestamp in the alarm storage format.

rows.Name: timeDate
rows.Comment: A SYSTIMEDATE struct containing the date and time (UTC)
